1.title: Los Angeles Qualifiers

episode of.title: American Ninja Warrior: Crashing the Course (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Crashing the Course is back for Season 2. Host Alex Weber hangs out with Jessie Graff in Los Angeles to get a look at a brutal new obstacle: The Cannonball Slider.

2.title: San Antonio Qualifiers

episode of.title: American Ninja Warrior: Crashing the Course (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Grant McCartney crashes the San Antonio course with host Alex Weber to break down the Sky Hooks. This complicated new obstacle is sure to be a ninja stopper.

3.title: Daytona Beach Qualifiers

episode of.title: American Ninja Warrior: Crashing the Course (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Jake Murray crashes the Daytona Beach course with host Alex Weber to behold the Wingnuts - an obstacle to challenge even the most veteran ninjas.

4.title: Kansas City Qualifiers

episode of.title: American Ninja Warrior: Crashing the Course (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Obstacle Design Challenge winner Kevin Brekke crashes the Kansas City course with host Alex Weber and ninja Natalie Duran to check out Crank It Up.

5.title: Los Angeles City Finals

episode of.title: American Ninja Warrior: Crashing the Course (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Drew Drechsel crashes the Los Angeles City Finals course with host Alex Weber to deconstruct the Swinging Pegboard - a swinging version of an already super difficult obstacle.

6.title: San Antonio City Finals

episode of.title: American Ninja Warrior: Crashing the Course (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Jesse "Flex" Labreck crashes the San Antonio City Finals course with host Alex Weber to check out Spinball Wizard.

7.title: Daytona Beach City Finals

episode of.title: American Ninja Warrior: Crashing the Course (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Ninja Daniel Gil crashes the Daytona Beach City Finals course with host Alex Weber and fans share what inspires them to work harder.

8.title: Kansas City Finals

episode of.title: American Ninja Warrior: Crashing the Course (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Ninja Grant McCartney and digital influencer Logan Paul crash the Kansas City City Finals course with host Alex Weber.

9.title: Las Vegas Stage 1

episode of.title: American Ninja Warrior: Crashing the Course (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: Alex Weber crashes stage 1 of the Las Vegas Finals course to get an insider look at some intimidating new obstacles.

10.title: Las Vegas Finals Stages

episode of.title: American Ninja Warrior: Crashing the Course (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: Alex Weber crashes Stages 2, 3 and 4 of the Las Vegas Finals course to get an insider look at some ninja-busting obstacles.

imdb.plot outline: Each week, host Alex Weber joins your favorite ninjas like Kacy Catanzaro, Geoff Britten, Ryan Stratis and more to get an insider's look at how an obstacle goes from an idea to the ultimate athletic challenge in Crashing the Course. And watch your favorite ninjas like Natalie Duran, Grant McCartney and more to see how they prime for competition in the weekly series 24/B4. Watch both NBC exclusive series on NBC.com and the NBC app.
imdb.title: American Ninja Warrior: Crashing the Course
akas: American Ninja Warrior: Crashing the Course (United States)
plot: Each week, host Alex Weber joins your favorite ninjas like Kacy Catanzaro, Geoff Britten, Ryan Stratis and more to get an insider's look at how an obstacle goes from an idea to the ultimate athletic challenge in Crashing the Course. And watch your favorite ninjas like Natalie Duran, Grant McCartney and more to see how they prime for competition in the weekly series 24/B4.
